name: Brokencyde
description: '''Brokencyde''' (stylized as '''brokeNCYDE''') is an American [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] group from [[Albuquerque, New Mexico]], founded in 2006. The group's lineup consists of Michael "Mikl" Shea and Julian "Phat J" McLellan, and musically are one of the founding groups in the [[crunkcore]] genre, which (in general description) is [[crunk|crunk hip hop]] music with [[screaming (music)|screamed vocals]].
